reviews.review: Juego  prácticamente obligatorio en tu biblioteca por lo que te puede ofrecer por solamente  8 euros, es un historia envolvente con unas físicas y jugabilidad  excelentes,

что еще сказать ЭТО ХАЛВА 2 
КАК ВСЕГДА ШЕДЕВЕР (на дворе был 2021 год(обзор на игру 2004 года)нет что вы я не опаздываю)

Мое уважение к Valve за такую прекрасную игру,в нее должен поиграть каждый,и пройти ее хотя бы один раз.Эта игра была прорывом в свое время,но и сейчас не перестает быть актуальной и ее проходят снова и снова,а это значит только одно-что игра хорошая и достойна хотя-бы внимания!!!
A based man at a cringe place can make all the difference in the world
En vrai Ravenholm c'est le meilleur moment du jeu c'est super bien
花了三十个小时多周目全成就通关了，没想到老游戏的射击体验剧情和交互都这么好，半条命系列不愧是划时代的作品，具有重复游玩的价值，强烈推荐！
muy bueno el juego espero el 3 pero creo que no se va a poder
唯一的缺点可能就是没出完吧。

Really solid FPS that holds up well even today. Physics-based puzzles are good fun and set in an interesting world. Gun play is fine, but then again, this is an older game so is understandable. Is a breath of fresh air to not have endless markers and maps forcing you to pause and open them every few mins. Looking forward to playing the spin-offs after this. 8/10

This game is special. Half Life 2 is one of few games that doesn't bombard the games story with cut scene after cut scene. Half Life 2 has maximum 5 instances where you are not in control. From beginning to end you are engaging with the story and kicking a$$ while you're at it. While the games graphics aren't astounding the have certainly aged well. The characters are likable such as Father Grigori .The plot is believable yet very zany and futuristic. The gravity gun creates many opportunities to save ammo especially in ravenholm where you can chop zombies in half by flinging a saw blade into them.
Based and Cringe Mr Freeman. Based and... Cringe.

Half Life 2 is truly one of the most imaginative games of the century. It truly defines the genre of first person shooter/ adventure. With it's quirky characters, fantastic gun play, and wild story, it makes for a fantastic play through for the ages.
I just really started playing PC games this year but always wanted to try this one and yeah, its as good as people say.
The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world
I liked the story because its mostly fun, Sometimes a little scary (Witch excites me) And that is what I like about it
Awesome game, cant wait for Half-Life 3!
funny crowbar man killing roboter humans with cool lazur guns

I played this game without buying on Steam for 3000+ hours. First game I played when I was 4. For me, it's still best video game on earth and it will always be. I'm waiting for next episode like 15 years and I will keep waiting cause it's worth for it. 
Love you forever Alyx.

Es Half Life 2, compralo. 
Posiblemente esta serie de videojuegos, es la razón por la que todos nosotros estamos aquí. A lo mejor en un universor paralelo donde Half Life jamas existio se siguen comercializando los juegos en CDs o Memorias USB
i bought a my second copy of hl2

Zamanına göre yok artık dedirten oyun. Harika demekten başka seçenek bırakmıyor. İçerisinde yer alan karakterlere bile binlerce komplo teorisi üretilen, fikir sunulan bir oyun. Tarihinde yerini almış serinin incisi konumunda.

Um clássico atemporal... Eu já tinha jogado este game há muitos anos atrás e lembro que era algo fora do comum, resolvi jogar novamente, para ter registrado aqui na Steam e para fazer as conquistas, (que são relativamente fáceis), foi legal relembrar cenários e o jogo como um todo. Valeu a pena e recomendo para quem não conhece ou nunca jogou (se é que existe. kkkk)
Good game. That's all I got to say. Cheap price for an amazing experience. 10/10

Ambiyans sesleri haritanın canlı olmaması ve bunun Source gibi gerici oyun motoru ile yapılması eğlenceli oyun yerine dahada gerici ürkütücü bir oyun yapmış.

çocukluğumun multi oyununu hiç trenden inip devamını getirmediğim hikaye modunu sonunda bitirdim ve zaman içerisinde oynadığım tüm oyunların half lifedan esinlendiğini yakından gördüm ve oyun hala oynanır durumda 2021 de bile aktı gitti... harbiden oyun gibi oyun mk her yönüyle

This game is just a masterpiece, I'm not gonna write a billion words for it, but if you can easily afford it, 100% recommend this game.
